Name: Image.GodRay
Desc: Adds volumetric light rays (god rays) to the image.
LongDesc: The GodRay method simulates volumetric light rays streaming from a source point, creating a dramatic lighting effect. It supports control over center, threshold, length, samples, strength, decay, exposure, angle, tint, and blending.
Example:
var img = new Q.Image({ width: 400, height: 300 });
img.Load('photo.jpg', function() { img.GodRay({ centerX: 60, centerY: 40, strength: 2 }); });
